name: Click sound
description: Plays a sound whenever you press a jump button.

enable-clicksound.name: Enable click sounds
enable-clicksound.description: Enable or disable click sounds without restarting the game!

OnlyOnJump.name: Only play on jump
OnlyOnJump.description: Doesn't play sound on movement of platformer keys

clicksound-currentsound.name: Current click sound
clicksound-currentsound.description: Change the click sound. 0 = Custom, 1 = Default, 2 = Metronome, 3 = Click One, 4 = Click Two, 5 = Fire In The Hole, 6 = I love GD Cologne, 7 = Vine Boom, 8 = Bwomp, 9 = Metal Pipe, 10 = TikTok, 11 = Plug.

custom-sound.name: Upload a custom sound
custom-sound.description: Select a .ogg, .wav, or .mp3 format file to set as sound 0. The best practice is to use sounds that start loudly and immediately.
